custom-sql.sql: SELECT IF(COUNT(1) > 0,true,false) AS hasActWithTries FROM ( SELECT IF(lat.latId IS NOT NULL, COUNT(1), 0) AS numTriesUser, la.actId, la.tries, la.improve FROM Lms_course c INNER JOIN Lms_learningactivity la ON c.groupCreatedId = la.groupId LEFT JOIN Lms_learningactivitytry lat ON la.actId = lat.actId AND lat.userId = ? LEFT JOIN lms_learningactivityresult lar ON lar.actId = la.actId AND lar.userId = lat.userId WHERE c.courseId = ? AND (lar.endDate IS NULL OR (lar.passed = TRUE AND la.improve = true)) GROUP BY la.actId ) AS TABLA WHERE tries = 0 OR numTriesUser < tries

SELECT Lms_Course.courseId, u.userId, IF(EXTRACTVALUE(Lms_Course.title, '//Title[@language-id=\"[$LANGUAGE$]\"]') != '', EXTRACTVALUE(Lms_Course.title, '//Title[@language-id=\"[$LANGUAGE$]\"]'), IF(EXTRACTVALUE(Lms_Course.title, '//root[@default-locale]//Title') != '', EXTRACTVALUE(Lms_Course.title, '//root[@default-locale]//Title'), Lms_Course.title )) AS courseTitle, CASE WHEN r.crId IS NULL THEN '0' WHEN r.passedDate IS NULL THEN '1' WHEN r.passedDate IS NOT NULL AND r.passed = 0 THEN '2' WHEN r.passed = 1 AND r.passedDate IS NOT NULL THEN '3' ELSE '0' END AS statusUser, CASE WHEN r.crId IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE r.result END AS result, Lms_Course.icon, Lms_Course.groupCreatedId, Lms_Course.friendlyURL, Lms_Course.executionStartDate, Lms_Course.executionEndDate, asset.summary, r.passedDate, r.registrationDate FROM Lms_course INNER JOIN classname_ classname ON classname.value='com.liferay.lms.model.Course' INNER JOIN assetentry asset ON asset.classPK = Lms_Course.courseId AND classname.classNameId = asset.classNameId INNER JOIN users_groups u ON Lms_Course.groupCreatedId = u.groupId AND u.userId = ? LEFT OUTER JOIN Lms_courseresult r ON Lms_Course.courseId = r.courseId AND r.userId = ? [$JOIN$] WHERE [$WHERE$] (Lms_Course.groupId = ? OR ? <= 0) [$FILTER_COURSES$] GROUP By Lms_Course.courseId

SELECT Lms_Course.courseId, u.userId, IF(EXTRACTVALUE(Lms_Course.title, '//Title[@language-id=\"[$LANGUAGE$]\"]') != '' , EXTRACTVALUE(Lms_Course.title, '//Title[@language-id=\"[$LANGUAGE$]\"]') , IF(EXTRACTVALUE(Lms_Course.title, '//root[@default-locale]//Title') != '' , EXTRACTVALUE(Lms_Course.title, '//root[@default-locale]//Title'), Lms_Course.title ) ) AS courseTitle, CASE WHEN r.crId IS NULL THEN '0' WHEN r.passedDate IS NULL THEN '1' WHEN r.passedDate IS NOT NULL AND r.passed = 0 THEN '2' WHEN r.passed = 1 AND r.passedDate IS NOT NULL THEN '3' ELSE '0' END AS statusUser, CASE WHEN r.crId IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE r.result END AS result , Lms_Course.icon, Lms_Course.groupCreatedId , Lms_Course.friendlyURL, Lms_Course.executionStartDate , Lms_Course.executionEndDate , asset.summary , r.passedDate , r.registrationDate FROM Lms_course INNER JOIN classname_ classname ON classname.value='com.liferay.lms.model.Course' INNER JOIN assetentry asset ON asset.classPK = Lms_Course.courseId AND classname.classNameId = asset.classNameId INNER JOIN users_groups u on u.groupId = lms_course.groupCreatedId INNER JOIN user_ ug on ug.userId = u.userId INNER JOIN usergrouprole urE ON u.userId = urE.userId AND urE.groupId = u.groupId LEFT OUTER JOIN Lms_courseresult r ON Lms_Course.courseId = r.courseId AND r.userId = u.userId WHERE roleId =? and u.userId = ? and (Lms_Course.groupId = ? OR ? <= 0) GROUP By Lms_Course.courseId

SELECT count(*) as Total FROM lms_course INNER JOIN users_groups u on u.groupId = lms_course.groupCreatedId INNER JOIN user_ ug on ug.userId = u.userId INNER JOIN usergrouprole urE ON u.userId = urE.userId AND urE.groupId = u.groupId WHERE roleId =? and ug.userId = ? and (Lms_Course.groupId = ? OR ? <= 0)

SELECT COUNT(1) AS total FROM Lms_course INNER JOIN users_groups u ON Lms_Course.groupCreatedId = u.groupId AND u.userId = ? LEFT OUTER JOIN Lms_courseresult r ON Lms_Course.courseId = r.courseId AND r.userId = ? [$JOIN$] WHERE [$WHERE$] (Lms_Course.groupId = ? OR ? <= 0) [$FILTER_COURSES$]
Lms_Course.closed = 0 AND Lms_Course.executionEndDate > '[$DATENOW$]' AND (r.crId IS NULL OR r.allowFinishDate IS NULL OR r.allowFinishDate > '[$DATENOW$]')
(Lms_Course.closed = 1 OR Lms_Course.executionEndDate < '[$DATENOW$]' OR r.allowFinishDate < '[$DATENOW$]' )
SELECT c.* FROM Lms_course c INNER JOIN users_groups u ON c.groupCreatedId = u.groupId AND u.userId = ? WHERE c.closed = 0 GROUP By c.courseId LIMIT [$START$], [$END$]
SELECT COUNT(c.courseId) as COUNT_VALUE FROM Lms_course c INNER JOIN users_groups u ON c.groupCreatedId = u.groupId AND u.userId = ? WHERE c.closed = 0
SELECT DISTINCT g.* FROM group_ g INNER JOIN Lms_course c ON g.groupId = c.groupId WHERE g.companyId = ?
SELECT DISTINCT Lms_Course.* FROM Lms_Course INNER JOIN group_ ON Lms_Course.groupCreatedId = group_.groupId [$JOIN$] WHERE [$WHERE$] (Lms_Course.companyId = ? || ? = 0)
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT Lms_Course.courseId) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM Lms_Course INNER JOIN group_ ON Lms_Course.groupCreatedId = group_.groupId [$JOIN$] WHERE [$WHERE$] (Lms_Course.companyId = ? || ? = 0)

WHERE ( (IF (ExtractValue(Lms_Course.title, '//Title[@language-id=\"[$LANGUAGE$]\"]' )='', ExtractValue(Lms_Course.title, '//root[@default-locale]//Title'), ExtractValue(Lms_Course.title, '//Title[@language-id=\"[$LANGUAGE$]\"]' )) LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) [$AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] (IF (ExtractValue(Lms_Course.description, '//Description[@language-id=\"[$LANGUAGE$]\"]' )='', ExtractValue(Lms_Course.description, '//root[@default-locale]//Description' ), ExtractValue(Lms_Course.description, '//Description[@language-id=\"[$LANGUAGE$]\"]' )) LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) )
WHERE (Lms_Course.groupId = ?)

WHERE (Lms_Course.executionStartDate >= '[$EXECUTION_START_DATE$]')
WHERE (Lms_Course.executionEndDate <= '[$EXECUTION_END_DATE$]')
WHERE (Lms_Course.parentCourseId = ? OR (0 = ? AND Lms_Course.parentCourseId IS NULL))
INNER JOIN assetentry ae ON ae.classNameId = [$CLASSNAMEID$] AND ae.classPK = Lms_Course.courseId
INNER JOIN assetentries_assetcategories aac[$i$] ON aac[$i$].entryId = ae.entryId AND aac[$i$].categoryId IN ([$CATEGORYIDS$])
INNER JOIN assetentries_assettags aat[$i$] ON aat[$i$].entryId = ae.entryId AND aat[$i$].tagId IN ([$TAGIDS$])
INNER JOIN layoutset ON layoutset.groupId = Lms_Course.groupCreatedId WHERE layoutset.layoutSetPrototypeUuid IN ([$TEMPLATES$])

INNER JOIN resourcepermission rp ON rp.name = 'com.liferay.lms.model.Course' AND rp.companyId = [$COMPANYID$] AND ((primKey = Lms_Course.courseId AND scope = 4) OR (primKey = [$COMPANYID$] AND scope = 1)) AND (actionIds & [$ACTIONPUBLISH$] || actionIds & [$ACTIONCOURSEEDITOR$] || actionIds & [$ACTIONASSIGN_MEMBERS$] || actionIds & [$ACTIONDELETE$] || actionIds & [$ACTIONPERMISSION$] || actionIds & [$ACTIONUPDATE$]) LEFT JOIN users_roles urperm ON rp.roleId = urperm.roleId AND urperm.roleId AND urperm.userId = [$USERID$] LEFT JOIN usergrouprole ugperm ON ugperm.groupId = Lms_Course.groupCreatedId AND ugperm.roleId = rp.roleId AND ugperm.userId = [$USERID$] LEFT JOIN groups_roles grperm ON grperm.roleId = rp.roleId LEFT JOIN group_ gperm ON grperm.groupId = gperm.groupId LEFT JOIN users_usergroups uugperm ON uugperm.userGroupId = gperm.classPK AND gperm.classNameId = [$CLASSNAMEIDUSERGROUP$] AND uugperm.userId = [$USERID$] LEFT JOIN users_orgs uoperm ON uoperm.organizationId = gperm.classPK AND gperm.classNameId = [$CLASSNAMEIDORGANIZATION$] AND uoperm.userId = [$USERID$] LEFT JOIN users_groups ugperm2 ON ugperm2.groupId = gperm.classPK AND gperm.classNameId = [$CLASSNAMEIDGROUP$] AND ugperm2.userId = [$USERID$] LEFT JOIN usergrouprole ugrpermC ON ugrpermC.groupId = Lms_Course.groupCreatedId AND ugrpermC.userId = [$USERID$] AND ugrpermC.roleId IN ([$ROLEEDITOR$],[$ROLETEACHER$]) WHERE (urperm.userId IS NOT NULL OR ugperm.userId IS NOT NULL OR uugperm.userGroupId IS NOT NULL OR uoperm.userId IS NOT NULL OR ugperm2.userId IS NOT NULL OR ugrpermC.userId IS NOT NULL)

INNER JOIN resourcepermission rp ON rp.name = 'com.liferay.lms.model.Course' AND rp.companyId = [$COMPANYID$] AND ((primKey = Lms_Course.courseId AND scope = 4) OR (primKey = [$COMPANYID$] AND scope = 1)) AND (actionIds & [$ACTIONVIEW$]) LEFT JOIN users_roles urperm ON rp.roleId = urperm.roleId AND urperm.roleId AND urperm.userId = [$USERID$] LEFT JOIN usergrouprole ugperm ON ugperm.groupId = Lms_Course.groupCreatedId AND ugperm.roleId = rp.roleId AND ugperm.userId = [$USERID$] LEFT JOIN groups_roles grperm ON grperm.roleId = rp.roleId LEFT JOIN group_ gperm ON grperm.groupId = gperm.groupId LEFT JOIN users_usergroups uugperm ON uugperm.userGroupId = gperm.classPK AND gperm.classNameId = [$CLASSNAMEIDUSERGROUP$] AND uugperm.userId = [$USERID$] LEFT JOIN users_orgs uoperm ON uoperm.organizationId = gperm.classPK AND gperm.classNameId = [$CLASSNAMEIDORGANIZATION$] AND uoperm.userId = [$USERID$] LEFT JOIN users_groups ugperm2 ON ugperm2.groupId = gperm.classPK AND gperm.classNameId = [$CLASSNAMEIDGROUP$] AND ugperm2.userId = [$USERID$] LEFT JOIN usergrouprole ugrpermC ON ugrpermC.groupId = Lms_Course.groupCreatedId AND ugrpermC.userId = [$USERID$] AND ugrpermC.roleId IN ([$ROLEEDITOR$],[$ROLETEACHER$]) WHERE (urperm.userId IS NOT NULL OR ugperm.userId IS NOT NULL OR uugperm.userGroupId IS NOT NULL OR uoperm.userId IS NOT NULL OR ugperm2.userId IS NOT NULL OR ugrpermC.userId IS NOT NULL)
WHERE (ae.visible = ?)
WHERE (ae.classtypeId IN ([$TYPE$]))
WHERE (group_.type_ IN ([$TYPE$]))
(r.passedDate IS NULL)
(r.passedDate IS NOT NULL)
